title: fct_error_report — fct_error_report
text: Currently includes 19 following Check: __Completeness__: 1. missingcountry: Country admin 1 information missing.  2. countryadmincheck: Administrative unit level 1 matching name ActivityInfo 5W "admin2" reference table.  3.  admin1and2check: Administrative unit level 2 matching name respective admin1 ActivityInfo 5W "admin2" reference table.   4.  miss_appeal_org: Missing appealing organization organization name corresponding name included ActivityInfo 5W "partners" reference table  5.  miss_setup: Checks field empty, mandatory fill variable "yes" cases implementing partner, "" activity corresponds direct implementation.  6.  miss_implementing_org: "yes" selected "implementation set " field, name implementing organization included corresponding field, otherwise retrieve error.  7.  miss_month: Missing month information.  8.  missing_what: missing information 5W "" fields, specifically: indicator sector, indicator, activity name, RMRP activity, CVA. __Consistency__:  9.  wrongsectindicator: indicator name correspond selected sector, per ActivityInfo 5W "indicators RMRP 23" reference table.   10.  zeroCVA: CVA field "yes", CVA value USD must entered, otherwise retrieve error.  11.  missingmechanism: CVA field "yes", CVA delivery mechanism must entered, otherwise retrieve error.  12.  CVANotoYes: CVA = “” Value Delivery Mechanism contains data, retrieve error empty CVA “Yes”.            13.  MultipurposeSector: retrieve error selected indicator sector "Multipurpose Cash Assistance (MPC)" CVA = "".   14.  DirectAssistanceNoBenef: indicator type selected "Direct Assistance" positive values entered new monthly beneficiaries total beneficiaries, otherwise retrieve error.    15.  NewBenefvstotal: value new monthly beneficiaries exceeds value total monthly beneficiaries. __Accuracy__:  16.  PopTypeBreakdown:  "Direct Assistance" indicators, checks sum population type breakdown equals new beneficiaries value. ERROR appears, please review breakdown values new beneficiaries' values corresponding activity  17.  AGDBreakdown: "Direct Assistance" indicators, checks sum age gender breakdown equals new beneficiaries' value. ERROR appears, please review breakdown values new beneficiaries' values corresponding activity  18.  CBuildingNoBenef: "Capacity Building" indicators, checks positive values total monthly beneficiaries field, field reported, otherwise retrieve error.  19.  NoOutput: indicators ones included "Direct Assistance" "Capacity Building", value "Quantity Output" always reported, otherwise retrieve error.
